com.github.daytron.revworks.service

Class CurrentUserSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.daytron.revworks.service.CurrentUserSession

  • public class CurrentUserSession
extends Object
    A static class for handling temporary user data in a session.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CURRENT_CLASSES
      The attribute key used to store the current classes associated with the current user
      static String CURRENT_COMMENT_COMPONENT
      The attribute key used to store the current executor service for comments.
      static String CURRENT_COURSEWORK_VIEW
      The attribute key used to store the current executor service for notes.

      The attribute key used for to store dashboard header view

      The attribute key used to store the current semester id

      The attribute key used to store the username in the session.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public static void set(Principal currentUser,
                       String semesterID,
                       CopyOnWriteArrayList<ClassTable> listOfClassTables,
                       com.vaadin.data.util.sqlcontainer.connection.JDBCConnectionPool jbdcConnectionPool)
        Sets the name of the current user and stores it in the current session. Using a null username will remove the username from the session. It also stores a list for generated files mark for deletion later on, the current semester through semester id and the SimpleJDBCConnectionPool object used for this session.
        Parameters:
        currentUser - The current user
        semesterID - The current semester
        listOfClassTables - The list of classes associated with the user
        jbdcConnectionPool - The SimpleJDBCConnectionPool object
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the current session cannot be accessed.

      • markForGarbageCollection

        public static void markForGarbageCollection(File fileToBeDeletedLater)
        Saves a file for deletion later on when the session closes.
        Parameters:
        fileToBeDeletedLater - A File object marked to be deleted

      • setCurrentCommentComponent

        public static void setCurrentCommentComponent(CommentComponent commentComponent)
        Saves the current CommentComponent.
        Parameters:
        commentComponent - CommentComponent object

      • getCurrentCommentComponent

        public static CommentComponent getCurrentCommentComponent()
        Access stored CommentComponent object.
        Returns:
        CommentComponent object if present, otherwise null

      • shutdownCommentExectorService

        public static void shutdownCommentExectorService()
        Shuts down executor service currently resides in the CommentComponent.

        Saves the current CourseworkView object.
        Parameters:

        public static CourseworkView getCurrentCourseworkView()
        Access stored CourseworkView object.

        Access the stored HeaderComponent object.
        Returns:
        HeaderComponent Object

      • shutdownDashboardHeaderExecutorService

        public static void shutdownDashboardHeaderExecutorService()
        Shuts down executor service currently resides in the HeaderComponent.

      • getFileTrashBin

        public static CopyOnWriteArrayList<File> getFileTrashBin()
        Access the list of trash can file collection ready for deletion.
        Returns:
        The CopyOnWriteArrayList object

      • getPrincipal

        public static Principal getPrincipal()
        Access the name of the current user stored in the current session, or null if no user name is stored.
        Returns:
        The user object
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the current session cannot be accessed.

      • getCurrentSemester

        public static String getCurrentSemester()
        Access the current semester id based on the current date.
        Returns:
        The semester id

      • getCurrentClassTables

        public static CopyOnWriteArrayList<ClassTable> getCurrentClassTables()
        Access list of classes associated with the current user. For admin user the list is empty by default.
        Returns:
        CopyOnWriteArrayList object

      • getJDBCConnectionPool

        public static com.vaadin.data.util.sqlcontainer.connection.JDBCConnectionPool getJDBCConnectionPool()
        Access the JDBC connection pool object that is used throughout the session.
        Returns:
        SimpleJDBCConnectionPool object

      • signOut

        public static void signOut()
        Signs out the current user attached to the current session. Closes the session and invalidates any bind UI to the session afterwards. It is important to close the session first to trigger destroy session listener before invalidation. The invalidate() method forces the Vaadin to create and redirect to a new session.
